acceptAdminRole(address).details: This function can only be called by the pending administrator.

params.localToken: The token to accept the administrator role for.
The token to register the administrator for.
The token to set the pool for.
params.pool: The pool to set for the token.

transferAdminRole(address,address).details: The new admin must call `acceptAdminRole` to accept the role.

params.localToken: The token to transfer the administrator role for.
params.newAdmin: The address to transfer the administrator role to. Can be address(0) to cancel a pending transfer.

acceptAdminRole(address).notice: Accepts the administrator role for a token.

getPool(address).notice: Returns the pool for the given token.

proposeAdministrator(address,address).notice: Proposes an administrator for the given token as pending administrator.

setPool(address,address).notice: Sets the pool for a token. Setting the pool to address(0) effectively delists the token from CCIP. Setting the pool to any other address enables the token on CCIP.

transferAdminRole(address,address).notice: Transfers the administrator role for a token to a new address with a 2-step process.
